description: Describes the what-if forecast created using the  CreateWhatIfForecast operation. In addition to listing the properties provided in the CreateWhatIfForecast request, this operation lists the following properties:

parameters.name: WhatIfForecastArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the what-if forecast that you are interested in.

nested_items.name: WhatIfForecastName
nested_items.description: The name of the what-if forecast.

nested_items.name: WhatIfForecastArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the what-if forecast.

nested_items.name: WhatIfAnalysisArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the what-if analysis that contains this forecast.

nested_items.name: EstimatedTimeRemainingInMinutes
nested_items.description: The approximate time remaining to complete the what-if forecast, in minutes.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the what-if forecast. States include:
ACTIVE.
CREATE_PENDING, CREATE_IN_PROGRESS, CREATE_FAILED.
CREATE_STOPPING, CREATE_STOPPED.
DELETE_PENDING, DELETE_IN_PROGRESS, DELETE_FAILED.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: If an error occurred, an informational message about the error.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: When the what-if forecast was created.

nested_items.name: LastModificationTime
nested_items.description: The last time the resource was modified. The timestamp depends on the status of the job:
CREATE_PENDING - The CreationTime.
CREATE_IN_PROGRESS - The current timestamp.
CREATE_STOPPING - The current timestamp.
CREATE_STOPPED - When the job stopped.
ACTIVE or CREATE_FAILED - When the job finished or failed.

nested_items.name: TimeSeriesTransformations
nested_items.description: An array of Action and TimeSeriesConditions elements that describe what transformations were applied to which time series.

nested_items.name: AttributeName
nested_items.description: The related time series that you are modifying. This value is case insensitive.

nested_items.name: Operation
nested_items.description: The operation that is applied to the provided attribute. Operations include:
ADD - adds Value to all rows of AttributeName.
SUBTRACT - subtracts Value from all rows of AttributeName.
MULTIPLY - multiplies all rows of AttributeName by Value.
DIVIDE - divides all rows of AttributeName by Value.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value that is applied for the chosen Operation.

nested_items.name: TimeSeriesConditions
nested_items.description: An array of conditions that define which members of the related time series are transformed.

nested_items.name: AttributeName
nested_items.description: The item_id, dimension name, IM name, or timestamp that you are modifying.

nested_items.name: AttributeValue
nested_items.description: The value that is applied for the chosen Condition.

nested_items.name: Condition
nested_items.description: The condition to apply. Valid values are EQUALS, NOT_EQUALS, LESS_THAN and GREATER_THAN.

nested_items.name: TimeSeriesReplacementsDataSource
nested_items.description: An array of S3Config, Schema, and Format elements that describe the replacement time series.

nested_items.name: Path
nested_items.description: The path to an Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket or file(s) in an Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that Amazon Forecast can assume to access the Amazon S3 bucket or files. If you provide a value for the KMSKeyArn key, the role must allow access to the key.

nested_items.name: KMSKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Key Management Service (KMS) key.

nested_items.name: Attributes
nested_items.description: An array of attributes specifying the name and type of each field in a dataset.

nested_items.name: AttributeName
nested_items.description: The name of the dataset field.

nested_items.name: AttributeType
nested_items.description: The data type of the field.

nested_items.name: Format
nested_items.description: The format of the replacement data, CSV or PARQUET.

nested_items.name: TimestampFormat
nested_items.description: The timestamp format of the replacement data.

nested_items.name: ForecastTypes
nested_items.description: The quantiles at which probabilistic forecasts are generated. You can specify up to five quantiles per what-if forecast in the  CreateWhatIfForecast operation. If you didn't specify quantiles, the default values are ["0.1", "0.5", "0.9"].
(string) ---
